senses: [{"definition":"To render fit, suitable, or correspondent; to adapt.","example":"to accommodate ourselves to circumstances"},{"definition":"To cause to come to agreement; to bring about harmony; to reconcile.","example":"to accommodate differences"},{"definition":"To provide housing for.","example":"to accommodate an old friend for a week"},{"definition":"To provide with something desired, needed, or convenient.","example":"to accommodate a friend with a loan"},{"definition":"To do a favor or service for; to oblige.","example":null},{"definition":"To show the correspondence of; to apply or make suit by analogy; to adapt or fit, as teachings to accidental circumstances, statements to facts, etc.","example":"to accommodate prophecy to events"},{"definition":"To give consideration to; to allow for.","example":null},{"definition":"To contain comfortably; to have space for.","example":"This venue accommodates three hundred people."},{"definition":"To adapt oneself; to be conformable or adapted; become adjusted.","example":null},{"definition":"Suitable; fit; adapted; as, means accommodate to end.","example":null}]
